properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key used for JWT token signing and verification.

properties.name: jwt.expiration
properties.description: JWT token expiration time in milliseconds.

properties.name: spring.websocket.max-text-message-size
properties.description: Maximum size of WebSocket text messages in bytes.

properties.name: spring.websocket.max-binary-message-size
properties.description: Maximum size of WebSocket binary messages in bytes.

properties.name: cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of origins allowed for CORS.

properties.name: cors.allowed-methods
properties.description: Comma-separated list of HTTP methods allowed for CORS.

properties.name: cors.allowed-headers
properties.description: Comma-separated list of HTTP headers allowed for CORS.

properties.name: cors.max-age
properties.description: Maximum age (in seconds) of the CORS preflight requests cache.
